remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建 委托时，需要标识将要处理该事件的方法。When you create an delegate, you identify the method that will handle the event. 若要将事件与事件处理方法关联, 请将委托的实例添加到事件。To associate the event with your event-handling method, add an instance of the delegate to the event. 只要事件发生, 就会调用事件处理方法, 除非删除委托。The event-handling method is called whenever the event occurs, unless you remove the delegate. 有关事件处理程序委托的详细信息, 请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about event-handler delegates, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何创建`FileSystemWatcher`对象以监视磁盘驱动器上发生的文件更改 (创建、删除、重命名、更改)。The following code example shows how to create a `FileSystemWatcher` object to monitor file changes (creates, deletes, renames, changes) occurring on a disk drive. 该示例还演示如何正确接收错误通知。The example also shows how to properly receive error notifications.
